trans-unit.source: Represents a control that draws a set of tick marks for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表繪製一組刻度的控制項將標示為<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The TickBar control draws tick marks that have a width of one pixel.
trans-unit.target: TickBar 控制項繪製刻度標記，具有一個像素的寬度。

trans-unit.source: You can define the location of the tick marks by specifying a repeating interval or a series of explicit points.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定重複的間隔或一系列明確點定義刻度的位置。

trans-unit.source: The TickBar control is specifically designed to work with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: TickBar 控制項專為搭配<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> displays tick marks.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>顯示刻度。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that has a TickBar.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>具有 TickBar。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: **Slider with a TickBar** ![Slider illustration](~/add/media/genericslider.png "Slider illustration") TickBar controls are typically defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Style> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: **滑桿列與**![滑桿圖例](~/add/media/genericslider.png "滑桿圖例")TickBar 控制項通常會定義中<xref:System.Windows.Style>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: For an example of a TickBar that is included in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> <xref:System.Windows.Style>, see [Slider Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 隨附於的 TickBar 範例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider><xref:System.Windows.Style>，請參閱[滑桿樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Style> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: The TickBar and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls both contain properties that perform the same function.
trans-unit.target: TickBar 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項都會包含執行相同的函式的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the TickBar properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they are bound.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 TickBar 屬性以及對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>會將繫結的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: The TickBar properties take precedence when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and TickBar properties that are related are both specified.
trans-unit.target: TickBar 屬性優先時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>時，如果同時指定 TickBar 屬性相關。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: **Related TickBar and Slider Properties** |TickBar property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property| |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.TickFrequency%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|
trans-unit.target: **相關 TickBar 和滑桿屬性**|TickBar 屬性 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>屬性 | |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.TickFrequency%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Ticks%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.TickFrequency%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that is used to draw the tick marks.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> ，用來繪製刻度標記。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> to use to draw tick marks.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref>用來繪製刻度標記。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Fill*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Fill*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Fill*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Fill%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Fill%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction of increasing value of the tick marks.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定增加值的刻度標記的方向。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the direction of increasing value is to the left for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> or down for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果增加值的方向是向左水平<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>或向下的鍵垂直<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"></xref> displays a selection range.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"></xref>顯示選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> properties define a selection range.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A>屬性會定義選取範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties must be set for the selection range to appear when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性必須設定為選取範圍時顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A>設`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> that has a selection range defined.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>包含控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>具有定義的選取範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: ![Slider selection range](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "Slider selection range") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ![Slider 的選取範圍](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "Slider 的選取範圍") # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a selection range is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果選取範圍會顯示。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSelectionRangeEnabled*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSelectionRangeEnabled*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsSelectionRangeEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum value that is possible for a tick mark.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定刻度標記可能的最大值。

trans-unit.source: Primary ticks are displayed for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A> and Maximum values, and secondary ticks are displayed for other values.
trans-unit.target: 主要刻度會顯示為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A>和最大值和次要刻度會顯示其他的值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>, the height of the primary ticks is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.
trans-unit.target: 水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>，主要刻度的高度等於<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>的</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>, the width of the primary ticks is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.
trans-unit.target: 垂直<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>、 主要刻度的寬度是否等於<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>的</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>

trans-unit.source: The size of the secondary ticks is 75 percent of the size of the primary ticks.
trans-unit.target: 次要刻度的大小為 75%的主要刻度的大小。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: The largest possible value for a tick mark.
trans-unit.target: 刻度標記可能的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 100.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 100.0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum value that is possible for a tick mark.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定刻度標記可能的最小值。

trans-unit.source: Primary ticks are displayed for the Minimum and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A> values, and secondary ticks are displayed for other values.
trans-unit.target: 主要刻度會顯示針對最小值和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A>值和次要刻度會顯示其他的值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>, the height of the primary ticks is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.
trans-unit.target: 水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>，主要刻度的高度等於<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>的</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>, the width of the primary ticks is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.
trans-unit.target: 垂直<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>、 主要刻度的寬度是否等於<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>的</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>

trans-unit.source: The size of the secondary ticks is 75 percent of the size of the primary ticks.
trans-unit.target: 次要刻度的大小為 75%的主要刻度的大小。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: The smallest possible value for a tick mark.
trans-unit.target: 刻度標記可能的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is zero (0.0).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為零 (0.0)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Draws the tick marks for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 繪製刻度的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property determine where tick marks are drawn in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.
trans-unit.target: 的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed%2A>屬性會決定在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>繪製刻度標記的位置</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsDirectionReversed%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Primary ticks are displayed for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A> values, and secondary ticks are displayed for other values.
trans-unit.target: 主要刻度會顯示為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A>值和次要刻度會顯示其他的值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>, the height of the primary ticks is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.
trans-unit.target: 水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>，主要刻度的高度等於<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>的</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>, the width of the primary ticks is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.
trans-unit.target: 垂直<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>、 主要刻度的寬度是否等於<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>的</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>

trans-unit.source: The size of the secondary ticks is 75 percent of the size of the primary ticks.
trans-unit.target: 次要刻度的大小為 75%的主要刻度的大小。

trans-unit.source: This method also draws ticks at the beginning and the end of a selection range if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A> property is `true` and if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd%2A> properties are valid.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會繪製刻度開頭和結尾的選取範圍，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A>屬性是`true`如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd%2A>屬性都有效。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> that is used to draw the ticks.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> ，用來繪製刻度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets where tick marks appear relative to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相對於顯示刻度<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The Placement value is used to make sure that the visible parts of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>, such as the end point indicators of a selection range, are displayed correctly.
trans-unit.target: 請確定用於放置值的可見部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>，例如選取範圍的結束點指標會正確顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement"></xref> enumeration value that identifies the position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> layout of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement"> </xref>列舉值，識別位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"></xref>中<xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref>配置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a space buffer for the area that contains the tick marks that are specified for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含所指定的刻度標記的區域的空間緩衝區<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The space buffer that is defined by the ReservedSpace property is designed to account for the space that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control uses when it is at either end of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.
trans-unit.target: ReservedSpace 屬性所定義的空間緩衝區設計來計算的空間，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控制項會使用任一端的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>時</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ReservedSpace property is divided in half.
trans-unit.target: 半分為 ReservedSpace 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: One half of the space is used as a buffer on one side of the tick mark collection, and the other half of the space is used as a buffer on the other side of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一個一半空間做為其中一端的刻度標記集合的緩衝區，另一半的空間做為集合的另一端上的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the total buffer area on either side of the row or column of tick marks.
trans-unit.target: 值，表示資料列或資料行的刻度標記的任一邊的總緩衝區區域。

trans-unit.source: The default value is zero (0.0).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為零 (0.0)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.ReservedSpace*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.ReservedSpace*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.ReservedSpace*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end point of a selection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取範圍的結束點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A> property must be set to `true` for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart%2A> and SelectionEnd properties to be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A>屬性必須設定為`true`如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart%2A>和 SelectionEnd 屬性使用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: The last value in a range of values for a selection.
trans-unit.target: 選項值的範圍中的最後一個值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1.0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the start point of a selection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取範圍的起始點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A> property must be set to `true` for the SelectionStart and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd%2A> properties to be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A>屬性必須設定為`true`如 SelectionStart 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd%2A>要使用的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.IsSelectionRangeEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: The first value in a range of values for a selection.
trans-unit.target: 選項值的範圍中的第一個值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1.0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.SelectionStart*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval between tick marks.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定刻度標記之間的間隔。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Ticks%2A> property is set to a value that is not `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A> property is not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Ticks%2A>屬性設定為值不是`null`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A>屬性不使用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Ticks%2A>

trans-unit.source: Tick marks are drawn at the interval that is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A> property, starting at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A> property and continuing until the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A> property is reached.
trans-unit.target: 繪製刻度標記的位置由所指定的間隔<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A>屬性的值開始<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A>屬性並繼續進行之前的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A>屬性為止。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickFrequency%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: The distance between tick marks.
trans-unit.target: 刻度標記之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The default value is one (1.0).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是一 (1.0)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.TickFrequency*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.TickFrequency*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.TickFrequency*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the positions of the tick marks.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定刻度的位置。

trans-unit.source: Tick marks that are defined by the Ticks property and that are outside the range that is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A> property values do not appear.
trans-unit.target: 刻度刻度屬性所定義的而且由所定義的範圍之外<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A>屬性值不會出現。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the Ticks property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.TickFrequency%2A> property is not used.
trans-unit.target: 當設定刻度屬性時，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.TickFrequency%2A>屬性不使用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.TickFrequency%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"></xref> that specifies the locations of the tick marks.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection"> </xref> ，指定的刻度標記的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Ticks*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Ticks*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。
